page.title: 05PLANTPAK MUNDON
page.content: {MR. HINDMARCH}started the company with 5 employees, in a small woodenshed, making wooden seed trays.The site now covers 7 acres and they employ 100 local people and they make 200 types of plastic plant pots, seed trays, and hanging baskets.First they collect unwanted waste plastic from other companies; they crush, heat and press it into the sheets, from which they make the finished articles.The machines run 24 hours every day.The finished prooducts are mainly sold in Paris,France.The rest are sold in large stores, such as{'MARKS and {SPENCER',TESCO,}and{WOOLWORTHS.}A company spokeman said that one of the advantages of the site, was "Its nearness to the Channel Ports".
